documents.document: @HCApeggy i know. Too fast. Have taken many pics and videos. We watch them when they r bad. Changes them for a few days...
@HCApeggy Yes. So true. I remember everyday changing diapers and... now im so "lame" and not kool enough. 😊
@HCApeggy LOL! Just becareful and take care of urself!
@BraddJaffy I feel like with the previous 2 GOP presidents, war is inevitable with this one as well. Mentally preparing myself.
@HCApeggy God bless u Peg!!! Ur heart is pure!
@HCApeggy Ty Peg. I am not deserving of ur praise. I'm feeling helpless watching evil men take positions that have life/death consequences.
@lauraevf1968 we need to prepare for primaries in 2018. Make sure we have young new faces with new ideas and little baggage.
@lauraevf1968 the most surprising issue for me was why would any woman vote for this guy,I mean all the vile and vulgars. Race was the issue
@lauraevf1968 @beebopbryant this is not the America that i grew up in. Didnt know there was so much underlying hate. Trump emboldened it.
@lauraevf1968 @beebopbryant Thankfully we r ok. But we know others who have. Ty
@lauraevf1968 @beebopbryant Since almost half the country elected this racist xenophobe as president, what does this say about our country?
@HCApeggy i hope we (USA and world) can survive this admin. All r connected in one way or another. All r financial tyrants.
@cjordan213 @dcexaminer @SenatorSchumer they will go nuclear and win with 51.
